ichor.cli.main_menu_submenus.points_directory_menu.points_directory_submenus package

Submodules

ichor.cli.main_menu_submenus.points_directory_menu.points_directory_submenus.submit_aimall_menu module

class SubmitAIMALLFunctions

Bases: object

static points_directory_to_aimall_on_compute()

Submits a single PointsDirectory or many PointsDirectory-ies to AIMAll on compute.

static select_encomp()

Asks user to select AIMAll -encomp setting

static select_method()

Asks user to update the ethod for AIMALL. The method needs to be added to the WFN file so that AIMALL does the correct calculation.

static select_naat()

Asks user to select AIMAll -naat setting

static select_number_of_cores()

Asks user to select number of cores.

class SubmitAIMALLMenuOptions(selected_method: str, selected_number_of_cores: str, selected_naat: int, selected_encomp: bool)

Bases: MenuOptions

selected_encomp: bool
selected_method: str
selected_naat: int
selected_number_of_cores: str

ichor.cli.main_menu_submenus.points_directory_menu.points_directory_submenus.submit_database_menu module

class SubmitDatabaseFunctions

Bases: object

static points_directory_to_database()

Converts the current given PointsDirectory to a SQLite3 database. Can be submitted on compute and works for one PointsDirectory or parent directory containing many PointsDirectory-ies

static select_database()

Asks user to update the ethod for AIMALL. The method needs to be added to the WFN file so that AIMALL does the correct calculation.

static select_submit_on_compute()

Asks user whether or not to submit database making on compute.

class SubmitDatabaseMenuOptions(selected_database_format: str, selected_submit_on_compute: bool)

Bases: MenuOptions

selected_database_format: str
selected_submit_on_compute: bool

ichor.cli.main_menu_submenus.points_directory_menu.points_directory_submenus.submit_gaussian_menu module

class SubmitGaussianFunctions

Bases: object

static points_directory_to_gaussian_on_compute()

Submits a single PointsDirectory to Gaussian on compute.

static select_basis_set()

Asks user to update the basis set.

static select_force_calculate_wfns()

Whether or not to recalculate wfns if they are already present

static select_method()

Asks user to update the method for Gaussian

static select_number_of_cores()

Asks user to update the basis set.

static select_overwrite_existing_gjfs()

Asks user whether or not to overwrite existing gjfs
